nodes.text: An R-series astromech droid was present on Chandrila Star Line's MPO-1400 Star Cruiser Halcyon during the war between the First Order and the Resistance. The droid had special modifications that included an antenna.

The astromech droid was first mentioned and first appeared in a Disney Parks Blog article that unveiled the poster for the Star Wars: Galactic Starcruiser resort. The article suggested the droid had special modifications, and a story.
